response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. We believe its worth extends far beyond its tangible aspects, making it a true investment for you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $12,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, providing you with a remarkable asset at a favorable rate while allowing us to realize its full potential value. We look forward to discussing this further and exploring how this product can enhance your endeavors.", "product_price": 12000}
